titleStmt.title: Three acts of the Generall Assembly for promoving [sic] the knowledge of the grounds of salvation and observing the rules of discipline
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly.
Makghie, J.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.

Overture for ordering of lecturing and catechising ... -- Act concering admitting expectants to their trials ... -- Act for putting in execution former acts and constitutions of generall assemblies anent trying, admitting, removing, and deposing of church officers ...
